content.prompt: The allusion in “Faint glories of the crown that Phoebus wears” (line 36) emphasizes the

choices.label: radiance of light exuding through the darkness
fading light of the sun’s rays dropping behind the hills
feats of strength demonstrated by a mythical creature
presence of the sun in the celestial hierarchy

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
